SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT ab.*, rownum cnt FROM (SELECT g.name,g.progress,g.jmstatus,h.jname,h.jstart,h.jend,g.pname, h.content,h.juptdate,h.jid,g.jmid,g.empno, nvl(g.iprogress,'해당없음') iprogress, g.iid FROM (SELECT e.name,f.jid,f.progress,f.jmstatus,e.pname,f.jmid,e.empno, z.iprogress,z.iid FROM (SELECT c.name,c.pid,c.ppid,d.pid,d.pname,c.mid,c.empno FROM (SELECT a.name,b.ppid,b.pid,a.mid,a.empno FROM MEMBER a, participants b WHERE a.mid=b.mid AND a.mid=#{mid}) c, project d WHERE c.pid=d.pid AND c.pid=#{pid}) e,jobmember f, ISSUES z WHERE 1=1 AND e.ppid=f.ppid AND z.jmid(+) = f.jmid
AND jmstatus LIKE '%'||#{jmstatus}||'%' ) g,jobplan h WHERE g.jid=h.jid order by h.jid ASC) ab) where cnt between #{start} and #{end} )

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ab.*, rownum cnt FROM (SELECT g.name,g.progress,g.jmstatus,h.jname,h.jstart,h.jend,g.pname,h.content,h.juptdate,h.jid,g.jmid,g.empno FROM (SELECT e.name,f.jid,f.progress,f.jmstatus,e.pname,f.jmid,e.empno FROM (SELECT c.name,c.pid,c.ppid,d.pid,d.pname,c.mid,c.empno FROM (SELECT a.name,b.ppid,b.pid,a.mid,a.empno FROM MEMBER a, participants b WHERE a.mid=b.mid AND a.mid=#{mid}) c, project d WHERE c.pid=d.pid AND c.pid=#{pid}) e,jobmember f WHERE e.ppid=f.ppid) g,jobplan h WHERE g.jid=h.jid order by h.jid ASC) ab

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT g.name,g.progress,g.jmstatus,h.jname,h.jstart,h.jend,g.pname,h.content,h.juptdate,h.jid,g.jmid,g.empno FROM (SELECT e.name,f.jid,f.progress,f.jmstatus,e.pname,f.jmid,e.empno FROM (SELECT c.name,c.pid,c.ppid,d.pid,d.pname,c.mid,c.empno FROM (SELECT a.name,b.ppid,b.pid,a.mid,a.empno FROM MEMBER a, participants b WHERE a.mid=b.mid AND a.mid=#{mid}) c, project d WHERE c.pid=d.pid AND c.pid=#{pid}) e,jobmember f WHERE e.ppid=f.ppid) g,jobplan h WHERE g.jid=h.jid) where 1=1
AND jmstatus LIKE '%'||#{jmstatus}||'%'

SELECT g.name,g.progress,g.jmstatus,h.jname,h.jstart,h.jend,g.pname,h.content,h.juptdate,h.jid FROM (SELECT e.name,f.jid,f.progress,f.jmstatus,e.pname FROM (SELECT c.name,c.pid,c.ppid,d.pid,d.pname FROM (SELECT a.name,b.ppid,b.pid,a.mid FROM MEMBER a, participants b WHERE a.mid=b.mid AND a.mid=#{mid}) c, project d WHERE c.pid=d.pid) e,jobmember f WHERE e.ppid=f.ppid) g,jobplan h WHERE g.jid=h.jid AND h.jid=#{jid}

SELECT g.name,g.progress,g.jmstatus,h.jname,h.jstart,h.jend,g.pname,h.content,h.juptdate,h.jid FROM (SELECT e.name,f.jid,f.progress,f.jmstatus,e.pname FROM (SELECT c.name,c.pid,c.ppid,d.pid,d.pname FROM (SELECT a.name,b.ppid,b.pid,a.mid FROM MEMBER a, participants b WHERE a.mid=b.mid AND a.mid=#{mid}) c, project d WHERE c.pid=d.pid) e,jobmember f WHERE e.ppid=f.ppid) g,jobplan h WHERE g.jid=h.jid AND h.jid=#{jid}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT g.name,g.progress,g.jmstatus,h.jname,h.jstart,h.jend,g.pname,h.content,h.juptdate,h.jid,g.jmid FROM (SELECT e.name,f.jid,f.progress,f.jmstatus,e.pname,f.jmid FROM (SELECT c.name,c.pid,c.ppid,d.pid,d.pname FROM (SELECT a.name,b.ppid,b.pid,a.mid FROM MEMBER a, participants b WHERE a.mid=b.mid AND a.mid=#{mid}) c, project d WHERE c.pid=d.pid) e,jobmember f WHERE e.ppid=f.ppid) g,jobplan h WHERE g.jid=h.jid AND h.jid=#{jid}) i,jobfile j where i.jmid=j.jmid AND i.jmid=#{jmid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO issues values(issues_seq.NEXTVAL, #{ititle}, #{icontent}, #{iprogress}, sysdate, sysdate, #{jmid} )
mapper.update: UPDATE issues SET ititle = #{ititle}, icontent = #{icontent}, iuptdate = sysdate WHERE iid = #{iid}
